General.Name: Seluxit A/S
General.Description: Seluxit A/S provides Internet of Things solutions. It offers security and privacy; embedded hardware and firmware; wireless communication; cloud and edge; and user interface solutions. The company provides Wappsto, an IoT platform, which includes device fleet and user management, sharing and fine-grained access control, no-code IoT platform, configurable dashboard, integrations and automation, and data and software encryption services; energy management systems; Wappsto: bit, a tool for learning about technology; and development resources and consultancy services. Seluxit A/S was founded in 2006 and is based in Aalborg, Denmark.
